channel.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
channel.description:
I have this client and server http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517239.60.html
The client doesn't allow you to type in, or look for other servers it just lets you type in username and pass word and log in thats it.
Next when I startup the server it says "Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594" How can i change this to my hamachi, AND if i am able to change it to my hamachi how would my friends join if they can only type in usernames and passwords?
Thanks

item.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

but it’s not worth using hamachi, you will only get like 3 players max.

Read full topic

@heatrn11 wrote:

dzdigital:

I know, I know i did port forward once, forwarded, turned on a mc server, within 5 minutes i got hacked end…

Thats why you hide your no-ip.

item.source: How can i bind my ip to my server?

item.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @dzdigital dzdigital
item.description:
@dzdigital wrote:

Ok thanks this will be my LAST question.

  1. So i changed the IP to my hamachi for client.
  2. There is no compiler that came with this client + server
  3. I started up the server and it says “server binded to port 0.0.0.0:43594”
  4. I can still log into the server

Right now im giving my edited client.rar to my friend to try and join

EDIT: My friend downloaded the updated client and tried to log in… Didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: How can i bind my ip to my server?

item.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage Owner Zack of PwnageScape
item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

Change the 127.0.0.1 to your Hamachi IP. You don’t have to change it in the server files. Don’t forget to compile!

Read full topic

item.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @dzdigital dzdigital
item.description:
@dzdigital wrote:

are there any other ways to change the IP to hamachi cause i went where you said to go
Client.java that was in the server files and i searched in notepad++ for the default ip but it just said “no text found”

What now?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i bind my ip to my server?

item.title: How can i bind my ip to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage Owner Zack of PwnageScape
item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

Client.Java, Search for 0.0.0.0 or 43594. Change the 0.0.0.0 to your Hamachi IP, and then the client will automatically connect.

Read full topic
